title: :goose_honk: Honk! New tweet <@&13619726
text:
:goose_honk: Honk! New tweet <@&1361972624007102636> - https://twitter.com/WhereWindsMeet_/status/2011883751366902192
## :tw_902192: [Where Winds Meet (@WhereWindsMeet_)](https://x.com/WhereWindsMeet_/status/2011883751366902192)
New wanderers joining the Jianghu after Jan 9 will get "Fledgling" status for 14 days.

Fledgling wanderers can earn [Fledgling Growth Chests] by completing Energy Challenge in solo, team, or co-op mode.

All wanderers can receive [Fledgling Appearance Chest], and cooperating with Fledgling wanderers grants bonus rewards in Guild, Hero's Realms, and Sword Trial modes.

A "Fledgling Bonus" is now available in Guild event.
If you complete them with a "Fledgling" wanderer, you have a chance to gain extra [Guild Fledging Gift] for everyone who takes part.

Let the adventure begin.

Where Winds Meet Version 1.2, "Live to Game," is now live!
